segments.text: Excuse me . But are you Mrs . Smith from America ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's it . I am Maria Smith . You must be Zhang Lin from Tianjin Sports Facility Co.Ltd .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Nice to meet you , Mrs Smith .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nice to meet you too , Mr . Zhang .
segments.speaker: S2
